definitions.title: Def
definitions.body: II. [[נכר]] (√ of foll., poss. = I. [[נכר]], whence the foreign, strange, as that which is intently regarded, so Thes, but precarious; cf. As. nakâru, rebel, Pa. change, nakiru, and nakaru, enemy, nukurtu, enmity, etc.; Ar. nakira in sense be bad, evil; II. change, alter a thing; Sab. [[נכר]] II. reject, injure, etc., [[נכרם]] injury Sab Denkm:76 CIS:iv. 81.9; 29.5; Min. [[נכר]] alter Hom:Südarab. Chrest. 128; Syr. nakar reject, nuwkoro0 alienus, etc.; Targum [[נוּכְרַי]] strange, foreign).
